verses.roman:
paṅgu nācāite yadi haya tomāra mana
vara deha' mora māthe dhariyā caraṇa

synonyms: paṅgu—lame man; nācāite—to make dance; yadi—if; haya—it is; tomāra mana—Your mind; vara—a benediction; deha'-kindly give; mora māthe—on my head; dhariyā—holding; caraṇa—Your lotus feet.
translation: "If You want to make a lame man like me dance, kindly bestow Your transcendental blessings by keeping Your lotus feet on my head.
